name: Tee Window Manager
description: Manages windows on large screens so that you can have a 3 windows side by side.

move_window_left.description: Move the window to a left 1/3 position

move_window_middle.description: Move the window to a middle 2/3 position

move_window_right.description: Move the window to a right 3/3 position

move_window_pos_half.description: Move the window vertically to the top and 1/2
